EU Alternative Fuel Strategy [VIDEO] Like it? 0 Posted March 22, 2013 Keywords: Carbon and De-carbonization , Electricity , Energy Security , Natural Gas , Environmental Policy , Oil , Biofuels , Renewables , Energy , Fuels , Politics & Legislation On 24 January 2013, the European Commission proposed a package of measures aimed at reducing Europe’s reliance on oil and boosting the uptake of alternative fuels such as electricity, natural gas and hydrogen.
